Text: I don't know what it is, this torrent was not very well for me. The formatting off the books keep including "birthright 1, birthright 12" which was quite the pain to try and ignore when reading since it and other things similar to it was everywhere. very annoying

I just started reading Birthright as well and I have the same issue.  I should have mentioned in the description that I converted these books from another torrent.  I did so as there were comments asking for EPUB.  Sorry if the quality is not the best on Birthright, I have not checked the other books yet.
